frontmatter.description: It all started when I asked a friend for help on a project two weeks ago. Having to set up the dev environment for every new machine is tedious and could cause issues down the road. Since Iâ€™ve been meaning to learn to use Docker, I decided to dockerize the app, which is a Node.js server and a PostgreSQL database with PostGIS extension that will serve an API for an iOS app.
frontmatter.title: How I learned Docker and deployed a Node.js server
